definitions.title: n.f. 1.
definitions.body: row, rank of soldiers in line.
architectural term. (prob. for [[סְדֵרָה]], v. supr. and cf. Ba:§ 92 a);—only pl. abs. [[שְׂדֵרוֹת]] 2Ki 11:8, 2Ch 23:14, [[רׂת]]- 1Ki 6:9, 2Ki 11:15; —
rows, ranks, 2Ki 11:8, and v:2Ki 11:15 = 2Ch 23:14 (where thought to be gloss by Benz, on account of [[מִבַּיִת]], within).
term. techn. of building, [[גֵּבִים וּשְׂדֵרׂת בָּאֲרָוִים]] 1Ki 6:9, meaning unknown.
